data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: Natural disasters can cause serious impacts on a country. Firstly, the country will face a dramatic economic recession after the disaster. This is because thousands of people lose their jobs and careers in the catastrophe, which will greatly hinder the economic development of the country. In addition, people's life quality will be deeply impacted after the disaster as the basic infrastructures, such as the electric systems and public transportation, may be destroyed in the disaster. Furthermore, people's health conditions will be negatively affected by the catastrophe as they may be physically disabled or mentally traumatized by the horrendous disaster. (98字)
data.referenceText: Discuss the long-term impacts to a country from a natural disaster, like an earthquake or hurricane.
data.referenceTranslate: 讨论自然灾害（例如地震或飓风）对一个国家的长期影响。
